channel.title: Hidden from the radar command
channel.description: I have no idea about how I would go about doing this. How can I make a person disappear off of the radar but still ingame, basically in a stealth mode. For example in use in maybe checking on something and you dont want people to know your there?

item.title: Hidden from the radar command
item.dc:creator: @p_e_e_p_z_i p e e p z i
item.description:
@p_e_e_p_z_i wrote:

Well heres a command to be invisible but not on the map

if (command.startsWith("hide") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your name here")) { sendMessage( "Other players can no longer see you, type ::show to reverse this command."); pHead = -100; pBeard = -100; pTorso = -100; pArms = -100; pHands = -100; pLegs = -100; pFeet = -100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Command to show yourself again

if (command.startsWith("show") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your name here")) { sendMessage( "Other players can now see you once again, type ::hide to reverse this command."); pHead = 3; pBeard = 19; pTorso = 19; pArms = 29; pHands = 35; pLegs = 39; pFeet = 44; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Just add that under any command example under noclip.

Read full topic
